org.sm.fraxion.fractals

Class MarkusLyapunovFractalIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sm.fraxion.fractals.AFractalIterator
      • org.sm.fraxion.fractals.MarkusLyapunovFractalIterator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MarkusLyapunovJellyfishFractalIterator, MarkusLyapunovLogisticBifurcationFractalIterator, MarkusLyapunovZirconZityFractalIterator

    public class MarkusLyapunovFractalIterator
extends AFractalIterator
    The MarkusLyapunovFractalIterator class provides a base class for Markus-Lyapunov fractals.
    Version:
    16/12/2014
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet

      MarkusLyapunovFractalIterator()

                                        org.sm.smtools.math.complex.ComplexNumber c,
                                        boolean saveOrbit)
        Helper method for a general iteration with the Markus-Lyapunov estimation algorithm.
        Specified by:
        iterate in class AFractalIterator
        Parameters:
        z - the complex variable z
        c - the complex parameter c
        saveOrbit - a boolean indicating whether or not the orbit should be saved
        Returns:
        the iteration result associated with the forward orbit of the complex variable starting point due to the specified complex number
